channel.title: No-ip
channel.description: to make a long story short i think my anti virus is blocking my no-ip. so to fix this should i buy a vps?

item.title: No-ip
item.dc:creator: @Killerswan Killerswan
item.description:
@Killerswan wrote:

[quote=“Pzezima2, post:3, topic:378264”]well i have 734684365834658346 times. no help.
i have no idea what is wrong with it. portforward is correct. my friend tryed to connect via my no-ip and my accuall ip adress. it wont connect
i can only connect via localhost. IDK why its like this. ive had servers before but not like this. i have tv. and people have tryed to help but still he cant connect.[/quote]

Did you add the ports to your firewall exception? are they opened and enabled in your modem? Is your No-ip turned ON ?

Read full topic
